prompt_ru: Им не хватает денег

answer_en: I see that these students have a thirst for knowledge

answer_en: She was late for dinner

answer_en: I have a thirst for knowledge

answer_en: Her apartment is close to the park

answer_en: He is responsible for checking this work

answer_en: The boy was very disappointed about such a low grade

answer_en: Not everything seems obvious to me

answer_en: He is really short of money

answer_en: Most workers are opposed to these changes

answer_en: The hotel is close to the sea

answer_en: Their cottage is near the lake

prompt_ru: Ему нечего бояться

answer_en: They were invited to this meeting

answer_en: He has a very profound knowledge of this subject

prompt_ru: Им нечего бояться
answer_en: They have nothing to be afraid of

prompt_ru: Он был горько разочарован этой неудачей

prompt_ru: Его также пригласили на вечеринку
answer_en: He was also invited to the party
transcription: [hi: wɒz ˈɔ:lsəʊ ɪnˈvaɪtɪd tu: ðə ˈpɑ:ti]

prompt_ru: Это равносильно поражению
answer_en: It is equivalent to a defeat
transcription: [ɪt ɪz ɪˈkwɪvələnt tu: ə dɪˈfi:t]

prompt_ru: Отель рядом с океаном
answer_en: The hotel is near the ocean
transcription: [ðə həʊˈtel ɪz nɪə ði ˈəʊʃən]

prompt_ru: Мне становится очевидно, что нам нужно быть с ним более осторожными
answer_en: It is becoming obvious to me that we need to be more careful with him
transcription: [ɪt ɪz bɪˈkʌmɪŋ ˈɒbvɪəs tu: mi: ðæt wi: ni:d tu: bi: mɔ: ˈkeəfəl wɪð hɪm]

prompt_ru: Она бросила на него сердитый взгляд
answer_en: She threw an angry look at him
transcription: [ʃi: θru: ən ˈæŋgri lʊk æt hɪm]
